data.text: @CityNewsVAN This just needs to go, full vax shouldnt need a test at least. The testing isnt helpful as the virus is in both countries at this point so. We just gotta go back to normal life all these restrictions dont help anymore since theyre not even up held in hospitals here.
@CityNewsVAN Just stop the bullshit it's over ffs
@jenniec_34 @CityNewsVAN Ha,ha yeah I just said that. It can't be about the money?
@CityNewsVAN What the hell is the difference? Nothing! How about no testing and get on with our lives. Ffs.
@CityNewsVAN Bad mistake we are just inviting covid into our cities

@TheJourneyGenie @CityNewsVAN Anyone doing a day trip from Canada who tests positive obviously would have contracted the illness in Canada, but would still have to stay in the US until ??? Even if asymptomatic? Border guards are going to be twiddling their thumbs awhile longer.
@CityNewsVAN Getting very tired of this shit. Get it together, you are embarrassing all of us and insulting us too.
@CityNewsVAN Ffs just let people cross again already like “normal”
